Description: hunter is a high mobility class for burst dps whose ability recharge times scale from the movement stat
solar revolves around burn damage
solar hunter has 2 main ult types knives for aoe burst damage or golden gun for sinle target both are HIGHLY effective in PVP or PVE so its personal prefarence
Recommended Aspects: Knock 'Em Down + On Your Mark
Knock 'Em Down buffs your knives and restores them on kill while boosting your super damage
On Your Mark gives massive handling and reload speed stacking with precision kills
These two together let you chain knife kills endlessly while keeping weapon swaps buttery smooth
Recommended Exotic Weapon: Sunshot for infinite scorch explosions that fuel all your solar fragments
void on hunter is mainly for debuffs and invis
voids hunter has 2 main ults daggers for single target dps or a bow which tethers and debuffs i reccomend the latter for PVP AND PVE whilst the daggers are only effective in PVP
Recommended Aspects: Stylish Executioner + Vanishing Step
Stylish Executioner makes you invisible whenever you kill a weakened or volatile target
Vanishing Step lets you dip into invis every time you dodge
These combine to create a looping invisibility machine that keeps you alive while debuffing everything
Recommended Exotic Weapon: Le Monarque for nonstop poison-weaken synergy with Stylish Executioner
arc hunter is high burst damage or tick damage
arc hunters two ults either let you roam with a staff or throw down an aoe lightning tick area i dont really reccomend this subclass as its other choices are much more effective
Recommended Aspects: Flow State + Tempest Strike
Flow State gives you jolt
Tempest Strike lets you slide-melee a thunder shockwave into the next zipcode
Together you become a dodge-sliding AOE lightning lawnmower shredding entire hallways
Recommended Exotic Weapon: Riskrunner for infinite chain-lightning while amplified
titan is a tank class whose abilities revolve around zone control and recharge times scale from resilience
titan solar revove around huge expolsions and high damage
solar titan ults both use hammers however one creates a line aoe and the other is thrown weaponry both are flexible enough to be used in PVP or PVE
Recommended Aspects: Sol Invictus + Roaring Flames
Sol Invictus spawns sunspots that heal you and scorch enemies whenever you pop things with solar damage
Roaring Flames boosts all ability damage the more you kill with abilities
Combined you become a sunspot-chugging supernova cycling hammer throws into mini-nukes
Recommended Exotic Weapon: Xenophage for high-heat solar detonations that feed your sunspot engine
void titan is versatie as it allows for highy defensive playstyles
void titans two ults are bubble which creates a defensive aoe or shield which lets you throw a high damage projectile i reccomend the latter for PVP and the previous for PVE but both are flexible
Recommended Aspects: Offensive Bulwark + Bastion
Offensive Bulwark boosts ability regen and melee power when inside your overshield
Bastion gives everyone overshields whenever you pop a barricade
The synergy is perfect: you barricade → overshield → grenade spam → melee bomb everything
Recommended Exotic Weapon: Graviton Lance for huge volatile waves and effortless add control
arc titan is a dps focused subclass
arc titans can either hava prolonged mode where they slam the ground and run around or they can be a single hit missle using their body both are effective in both PVP and PVE
Recommended Aspects: Touch of Thunder + Juggernaut
Touch of Thunder supercharges your grenades turning ionic nades into roaming thunder storms
Juggernaut gives you a frontal overshield while sprinting letting you shoulder-charge anything
You basically turn into a lightning bulldozer throwing storm grenades that chase enemies across continents
Recommended Exotic Weapon: Thunderlord for lightning-chaining chaos that keeps ionic traces flowing
warlock is an aoe and debuff class that revolves around the intelect stat for recharge time
solar warlock revolves around healing and buffing allies
solar warlocks ults either allows them to fly and shoot projectiles OR create an aoe area with healing and damage buffs. for pvp i reccomend flying but for PVE i reccomend well of radiance
Recommended Aspects: Heat Rises + Icarus Dash
Heat Rises lets you float while healing and boosting grenade regeneration when consuming your grenade
Icarus Dash gives you aerial dodges making you the most mobile warlock alive
The synergy lets you become an airborne flamethrower raining ignition grenades from the sky
Recommended Exotic Weapon: Skyburner’s Oath for aerial solar explosions that benefit from Heat Rises
void warlock revolves around using large aoe explosions to clear out waves of enemies

void warlock can either throw a large nova bomb which does single damage or tick damage or finally they can choose to access a mode where they can teleport around and use less powerful explosions centered on the player i reccomend the large bomb for both PVP and PVE
Recommended Aspects: Feed the Void + Chaos Accelerant
Feed the Void gives devour on ability kills letting you heal from everything forever
Chaos Accelerant supercharges your grenades into miniature black holes
Combined you become a void artillery piece lobbing gravitational nukes while never dying
Recommended Exotic Weapon: Collective Obligation to apply void debuffs constantly and maintain devour uptime
arc warlock allows the user to buff and damage deal as a midground for its subtrees
arc warlocks ults either allow it to roam like emperor palpatine or remain stationary but fire a single high dps beam for PVP i reccomend the first but for PVE the latter
Recommended Aspects: Arc Soul + Electrostatic Mind
Arc Soul gives you and your teammates auto-aim lightning buddies
Electrostatic Mind creates ionic traces whenever you jolt or blind enemies
Together they turn you into an amplified storm mage endlessly feeding ability energy back into itself
Recommended Exotic Weapon: Delicate Tomb for nonstop ionic trace generation and jolt spam
